title: James Martin interrupts Saturday Morning to make 'big news' announcement
description: James Martin made a return to Saturday Morning this weekend with a brand new series.
content:
James Martin announced some "big news" on Saturday morning as the TV chef returned to his ITV cooking show. James and the Saturday Morning crew have taken a long summer break and have enjoyed some much-needed time off. At the beginning of June, James bid farewell to viewers after he confirmed he was taking a break from filming. "That is also it for the series. Me and the crew are heading off on sunny holidays. Different climates." As he explained, he would be spending his break in Yorkshire. James added, "But we will be back here with more top chefs, other brilliant guests, and more delicious recipes later on in the year. "Until then, thanks for watching. Have a wonderful, fantastic summer. I'll see you out there wherever you are. Thanks for watching, see you again soon, goodbye for now." However, the TV star was happy to be back this weekend as he welcomed Dead Ringers stars Jon Culshaw, Jan Ravens, and Peter Wright from The Yorkshire Vet onto the show.

After introducing his guests, James paused the show to tell viewers he had some "big news". He shared: "Now that's not all, because we're kicking off the series with a bang, as we're joined by two legends of the food world who are both welcome round to my house anytime they like. "I don't think they have left since the last series. It's Lesley Waters and Atul Kochhar." He continued: "Big news, big news as well. We are nominated thanks to you guys, and thanks to you for watching for an NTA. "We are shortlisted... the Final Four. So get voting for us if you can, please as well."

James took to his Instagram account earlier this month to share the news that Saturday Morning had been shortlisted for an NTA. "Wow, what news! You have shortlisted the show to the final 4 fave shows on daytime at this year’s NTAs," the TV chef penned. "Thank you on behalf of the team here and if you have a moment please vote! First time in 32 years on TV we have been on the list. Thank you again and thanks for voting! Link in story and bio!" James Martin's Saturday Morning is available to watch on ITVX.
summary: James Martin, the TV chef, interrupted his Saturday Morning show to announce some "big news" as he returned to the show after a long summer break. The announcement came after James announced he was taking a break from filming and planning to spend it in Yorkshire. He also mentioned that the show had been shortlisted for an N.A.
shortSummary: James Martin announced a "big news" on ITV's Saturday Morning, including his return from a summer break, shortlisted for an NTA.

argos_summary: James Martin announced that his ITV breakfast show "Saturday Morning" has been shortlisted for the final four of this year’s National Television Awards (NTAs). He revealed the news during a recent episode, noting the show’s return with new guests and top chefs. The announcement follows a summer break for the show’s crew and includes a call for viewers to vote. The update highlights the show’s renewed prominence after 32 years on television.
